description:
As an old merchant
              I want to access the portal using my email and the password set in the registration
name: The user should be able login to endabank

elements.name: The user should be allowed to login

steps.name: the user is on the endabank login page
the user types in a valid email
the user types in a password
the user clicks on login buttton
the user has to be allowed to see their profile, password management and Logout in the page

elements.name: The user should be warned when the email format is incorrect

steps.name: the user is on the endabank login page
the user types in an email with an incorrect format
the user types in a password
the user should see a highlight error message "This field must be a valid email"
